Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two of the children exhibited a homozygous deficiency characterized by the absence of the 150 - kD form of Factor H and the presence , upon immunoblotting , of the 42 - kD Factor H - like protein 1 ( FHL - 1 ) and other FH - related protein ( FHR ) bands .

Let's think step by step.

| Factor H deficiency |
| Homozygous Factor H deficiency |
| FHL-1 |
| FHR |
